sentence.Network_en: The Roswell Poor Clares offer screens of descriptive material aimed at dispelling myths about monasticism.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗斯韦尔的嘉辣会修女们提供了多屏描写性材料,目的在于消除关于宗教社区研究的种种谎言.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 继之，又有修道主义（Monasticism）兴起，力抗教会走上衰微之路，以贞洁、守贫之情，在日夜祈祷的呢喃中，将历史的焦点带进中 …

means.word_mean: 1. asceticism as a form of religious life; usually conducted in a community under a common rule and characterized by celibacy and poverty and obedience
